channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inflation becomes a wholesalers’ problem as producer prices surge
item.description: The Producer Price Index posted the largest one-month increase in over a year.

item.title: This week's most overbought stocks include several real estate names and a regional bank
item.description: A better-than-expected consumer inflation report led investors to buy rate-sensitive stocks such as REITs and industrials.

item.title: 5 things investors learned from JPMorgan Chase’s earnings
Tech’s war for AI talent is creating a ‘massive consolidation’ problem, lawmakers say
item.description: So-called “acqui-hires,” in which one company acquires another to absorb talent, allow companies to avoid regulatory scrutiny.

item.title: Here's the deflation breakdown for June 2024 — in one chart
item.description: Prices have fallen for physical goods, gasoline, airfare and some grocery items like apples since June 2023, according to the consumer price index.

item.title: How JPMorgan’s business mix benefits bondholders — live banking-sector coverage
Jamie Dimon: Prices will be higher for longer
item.description: The JPMorgan Chase CEO also warned that geopolitical instability could present future risks.

item.title: StubHub delays IPO until after Labor Day
item.description: The online ticketing service had been eyeing a summer initial public offering, aiming for a valuation of at least $16.5 billion.

item.title: Dow back atop 40,000 mark after wholesale-inflation data and big-bank earnings
Tesla’s AI dreams may ‘materialize on a longer time horizon (or not at all),’ UBS warns
item.description: “While TSLA is investing heavily in AI and the tech is making progress, investment is costly, pace of improvement may slow and the payoff is long dated,” UBS analyst Joseph Spak warned.

item.title: Democratic megadonor Ron Conway took his concerns about Biden directly to Pelosi
item.description: President Joe Biden might be on the brink on losing a key ally in Silicon Valley.

item.title: CPI and PPI suggest subdued reading from Fed-favored PCE inflation gauge
Apple stock poised to rise 11% on iPhone AI updates, says BoA
item.description: The bank’s global smartphone survey reveals a commitment among iPhone users to upgrade, eyeing soon-to-launch generative AI features.

item.title: These are America's 10 most expensive states to live in for 2024
item.description: Inflation is coming down, but in these 10 U.S. states, residents still face the nation's highest cost of living, from food to insurance and housing.

item.title: U.S. consumer sentiment falls to eight-month low as inflation worries persist
